io.doov.core.dsl.impl.num

Class NumericCondition<N extends java.lang.Number>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.doov.core.dsl.impl.DefaultFunction<T,PredicateMetadata>
      • io.doov.core.dsl.impl.DefaultCondition<N>
        • io.doov.core.dsl.impl.num.NumericCondition<N>
  • Type Parameters:
    N - the type of the field value
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextAccessor<N>, Function<N>, NumericOperators<N>, DSLBuilder, MappingInput<N>, Readable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NumericFunction

    public abstract class NumericCondition<N extends java.lang.Number>
extends DefaultCondition<N>
implements NumericOperators<N>
    Base class for numeric conditions.

    It contains a DslField to get the value from the model, a PredicateMetadata to describe this node, and a BiFunction to take the value from the model and return an optional value.
